publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1797 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Limits, Conditions and Representation (Scotland) Regulations 2008)—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Advice and Assistance (Limits, Conditions and Representation (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*

S3M-1797 Kenny MacAskill: The Draft Advice and Assistance (Limits, Conditions and Representation (Scotland) Regulations 2008)—That the Justice Committee recommends that the draft Advice and Assistance (Limits, Conditions and Representation (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Fergus Ewing
